EmailTemplate.description: Email Notification that is sent out to BSD Pricing team upon Rep Customer Disposition value - Customer request earlier transition date
EmailTemplate.name: Non-Written Agreement Rep Customer Disposition
EmailTemplate.subject: Customer Disposition: {!Customer_Transition__c.OMX_Primary_Key__c} - {!Customer_Transition__c.Account__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
THIS ACCOUNT IS REQUESTING AN EARLIER TRANSITION DATE AND THE PRICING LIFECYCLE TEAM MUST CONTACT THE REP TO DETERMINE IF THE CUSTOMER CAN OR CANNOT MOVE FORWARD WITH AN EARLIER TRANSITION DATE.
PRICING LIFECYCLE IS REQUIRED TO MANUALLY CHANGE THE SCHEDULED DATE TO THE AGREED UPON DATE THE SALES REP AND IMPLEMENTATION HAVE AGREED UPON.
